name: Omelette Adventure
description:
You play as a chicken trying to save its explosive eggs.

WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

Release LeftClick to throw egg.

 Hold Left Click to slow time.

You need to flee from one portal to another. Eggs count as your ammunition as well as your health.

PS: A Frying Pan Boss was in progress but like a lot of other jam games it had to be removed due to time restriction and ambition.
